metadata.Title: CVE-2019-6988 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in OpenJPEG 2.3.0. It allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (attempted excessive memory allocation) in opj_calloc in openjp2/opj_malloc.c, when called from opj_tcd_init_tile in openjp2/tcd.c, as demonstrated by the 64-bit opj_decompress.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> no upstream fix available as of 2022-03-31

criterions.comment: openjpeg2 package in impish is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
